DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting information effect hematologic cancer treatment quality life may help doctor learn disease plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This phase I trial study quality life young leukemia lymphoma survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Younger Leukemia Lymphoma Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To collect preliminary data determine extent impairment quality life young adult survivor hematologic malignancy . - To identify common area concern survivor . - To explore pattern quality-of-life impairment associate age , gender , type treatment ( transplant v non-transplant ) survivor . OUTLINE : Patients assess telephone interview use brief demographic clinical data form . Patients undergo quality-of-life assessment Cancer Patient/Cancer Survivor Version questionnaire via telephone .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Survivors leukemia ( i.e. , acute myelogenous leukemia , acute lymphoblastic leukemia , chronic myelogenous leukemia , chronic lymphocytic leukemia ) lymphoma ( i.e. , nonHodgkin lymphoma Hodgkin lymphoma ) receive cytotoxic radiation therapy Received treatment leukemia lymphoma 110 year ago PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
